name: otf
description:
To improve scalability for very large and massively parallel traces the
Open Trace Format (OTF) is developed at ZIH as a successor format to the
Vampir Trace Format (VTF3).

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependent_to.name: sst-elements
dependent_to.description:
SST Elements implements a range of components for performing
architecture simulation from node-level to system-level using the SST
discrete event core.

dependent_to.name: vampirtrace
dependent_to.description:
VampirTrace is an open source library that allows detailed logging of
program execution for parallel applications using message passing (MPI)
and threads (OpenMP, Pthreads).

dependent_to.name: ravel
dependent_to.description:
Ravel is a parallel communication trace visualization tool that orders
events according to logical time.
